attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's time Dorset declared independance from the UK. We have the lowest wages in the UK, the highest house prices and high Council tax bills. 

Dorset has the biggest mainland oil field in Europe and does not get any of the benefits. Lets ditch the rest of the UK and go it alone!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
